attributes.action: sack Ed Balls from the post of Secretary for state children, schools, and families for his inability to run his department.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ed Ball should have resigned or been sacked over the mistakes that have occured such as the marking of the SATs, or late EMA psyments. The idea of Ministerial reponsibility means that he should take the blame.
